titles.title: Oh How He Loves (easy very nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One there is above all others Oh how He loves His is love beyond a brothers Oh how He loves Earthly friends may fail or leave us One day soothe the next day grieve us But this Friend will ne'er deceive us Oh how He loves{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis eternal life to know Him Oh how He loves Think oh think how much we owe Him Oh how He loves With His precious blood He bought us In the wilderness He sought us To His fold He safely brought us Oh how He loves{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed Jesus would you know Him Oh how He loves Give yourselves entirely to Him Oh how He loves Think no longer of the morrow From the past new courage borrow Jesus carries all your sorrow Oh how He loves{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All your sins shall be forgiven Oh how He loves Backward shall your foes be driven Oh how He loves Best of blessings He'll provide you Nought but good shall e'er betide you Safe to glory He will guide you Oh how He loves{/lang-eng}
